about:
Hello!
I'm Hana Cheng,
a passionate Web Frontend Developer.
Mainly develop using Javascript,reactJS,nodeJS.
I'm keen on tackling problems because it brings me huge sense of accomplishment.

My Hobby is playing guitar and PC games.

My teamwork skills have impoved alot through this experience.
Besides,I learnt Korean and music theory.
